question: Alex saw a number 12345 on the scale. Where should the commas be placed in this number according to the International Place Value System?
Mia looked at another label and saw the number 678901. Can you help them identify this number properly with commas?
They noticed the number 1234567. How should commas be placed in the number 1234567?
Sophie read the label and saw 9876543. How should commas be placed in this number?
Alex showed his friends a treat with 12345678 on it. 'How should we write this number with commas according to the International Place Value System?'
Mia glanced at a different treat with the number 4,752. 'What is the place value of the digit 7 in this number?'
Liam noticed the number 56,789 on a label. Can you tell me the place value of the digit 5 in this number?
Sophie looked at the label and saw 987,654. 'What is the place value of the digit 6 in this number?'
Alex found a treat with the number 1,234,567 on it. 'What is the place value of the digit 1 in this number?'
Liam noticed the number 8,765,432 on one of the labels. 'What's the place value of the digit 5?'
